channel.title: Projekt DragonzPkzScape V6 Remix [Recuriting] A Massive Project To Be!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://img254.imageshack.us/img254/5534/glittercf67c6b722a6b90ety8.gif[/img]
[url=http://www.fodey.com/generators/animated/talking_owl.asp][img]http://r3.fodey.com/101cdf17534a34a5e9c6265ac829a82f6.1.gif[/img][/url]
Heya Guys Im Fallendevil How Are You All? Oh Well The Reason Im Making DragonzPkzScape V6 Is Because I Like P Servers It Is DragonzPkzScape That Means Dragons Got Player Killed And The Other Versions Was All Boring This Server I Will Make Non Silab So All Of U Can Play Also Cheat Clients Are Banned And Are Not Permitted I Can Tell What Client U Use Coz When You Login It Logs Your User And The Client U Use If U Use A Cheat Client It Pops Up Saying Certain User Is Using A Cheat Client And Then I Get Your User And Ban You I Also Re Making V6 I Didnt Like EvilScape V2 So I Decided To Use PimpScape I Have Started Coding It I Have Mixed Many Bugs And Many Glithces Such Has Dieing And Logging Out U Dont Log Now Training Is On Dummies This Server Will Most Proberly Last Server I Play And Use And Make As I Want To Quit Rs And Rs P Servers Also If U Have Ever Heard Of A Server Called DigitalScape That Is A Good Server But I Dont Think Its Good Because There Many Cheats Although Its Auto Ban For Using Autoers On That Server And Will Be On Mine Anyway Lets Start With The Basics
[url=http://www.fodey.com/generators/animated/ninjatext.asp][img]http://r3.fodey.com/14f6a711f8b244e9d9ee3dfa26c514686.1.gif[/img][/url]
Chapter 1: The Basics Chapter 2: The Rules Chapter 3: The Updates Chapter 4: Length Of Time Left Chapter 5: Staff Taking On Chapter 6: Staff Token On Chapter 7: The Declined Chapter 8: Frequently Asked Questions Chapter 9: Layout For Applying Chapter 10: The Picture's Chapter 11: The Credits ---------------------------------- CHAPTER 1: The Basics | ---------------------------------- Server Base: PimpScape Server Owner: Owner Dragon Server Uptime: Not Yet Sure Server Bugs: Yes Not Many Now Though Server Glitches: Yes A Few Server Membership: Yes Server Co Owner/s: Co 1: ModKilla Co 2: B L I T Z D Co 3: Melissa T Co 4: Mod Matt No-ip/Ham: No-Ip Starting Place: Falador Park! -----E-N-D-O-F-C-H-A-P-T-E-R-1---- | Chapter 2: The Rules | | | -------------------------------------_________ 1.Do Not Swear | 2.Do Not FLAME If Declined | 3.Do Not Put 1st 2nd 3rd 4th Post Its Annoying | 4.Only Apply 1 Time In 1 Hour | -----------------------------------------------| Chapter 3: (The Updates) | -------------------------- [code] 1.Added MemberShip 2.Fixed Some Bugs 3.Fixed Some Glitches 4.Added New Menus 5.Fixed Character Glitch 6.Added Whip Special 7.Fixed Training 8.New Starting Kit 9.New Starting Place 10.Fixed Falador 11.Fixed Aincients 12.Added 2 New MiniGames 13.Added A Admin Place 14.Added Shop Commands 15.Made Server Not Silab 16.Deleted Old Pimp Wildy Sign And Made It Wildy! 17.Added So Jad Is Easy To Kill 18.Added GlobalObjects 19.Defence Now 99% Working 20.2 Quests Now Work 21.U Now Get Quest Points 22.Added A Fully Working Seers Bank 23.Aradouge Zoo Now Kinda Works 24.Added A Anti SyiPkPker 25.Added Working Emotes 26.Added Dragon Longsword Special 27.Added Dragon Dagger (S) Special [/code] ----------------------- Chapter 4: Time Left | --------------------------------------------------------------- ||||||||||12% Complete | 2 1/2 Month Left Not Yet Exact | --------------------------------------------------------------- CHAPTER 5: Staff I Need | ----------------------------
[ul] [list][li]Hoster[/li][/list] [list][li]Coders[/li][/list] [list][li]Advertisers[/li][/list] [list][li]HomePage Maker[/li][/list] [list][li]Testers[/li][/list] ---------------------------[/ul]
CHAPTER 6: Staff Taken On
Hoster --
Coders -- -- -- --
Advertisers (Unlimited)
-- -- -- -- -- -- --
HomePage Maker
--
Testers
-- -- -- -- -- --------------------------------- CHAPTER 7: THE DECLINED --------------------------------- No 1 Has Been Declined Yet --------------------------------- CHAPTER 8: FAQ --------------------------------- NONE HAS BEEN ASKED YET --------------------------------- CHAPTER 9: Layout --------------------------------- [code]User: Name: NickName: Position: Experiance: Why Should I Pick You: Proof: (Hosters) How Long Can You Host: No-ip: Proof (Coders) Experiance: Coded Servers: Can I Trust You:[/code] ------------------------------------- CHAPTER 10: THE PICTURES ------------------------------------- Training Place [IMG]http://i24.tinypic.com/23h5b9j.jpg[/img] (More To Come) ------------------------------------- CHAPTER 11: THE CREDITS ------------------------------------- Paldino79 For Specs Fedexer For GlobalObjects Owner Of PimpScape Writney For Membership Me For Others ------------------------------------- Mods Please Do Not Remove Also Forum Link Is In My Sig Has I Am Given Members Staff If They Get Accepted
(FEEDBACK)
[quote="chipmunk man"]Nice non-free forum.
Gl on project[/quote] [quote="moparRuler"]good job this should be intresting when its done :D[/quote] [quote="gamefreek4life"]hello dragon. You already told me im head admin and a global moderator. But ill be a tester too :D. Cant w8 tell this comes out :). Goodluck with server :cool:[/quote]

[/quote]

Barking Refresh Forums :P[/quote]yup.

@Pureman0194 wrote:

Heya Guys Im Fallendevil How Are You All? Oh Well The Reason Im Making DragonzPkzScape V6 Is Because I Like P Servers It Is DragonzPkzScape That Means Dragons Got Player Killed And The Other Versions Was All Boring This Server I Will Make Non Silab So All Of U Can Play Also Cheat Clients Are Banned And Are Not Permitted I Can Tell What Client U Use Coz When You Login It Logs Your User And The Client U Use If U Use A Cheat Client It Pops Up Saying Certain User Is Using A Cheat Client And Then I Get Your User And Ban You I Also Re Making V6 I Didnt Like EvilScape V2 So I Decided To Use PimpScape I Have Started Coding It I Have Mixed Many Bugs And Many Glithces Such Has Dieing And Logging Out U Dont Log Now Training Is On Dummies This Server Will Most Proberly Last Server I Play And Use And Make As I Want To Quit Rs And Rs P Servers Also If U Have Ever Heard Of A Server Called DigitalScape That Is A Good Server But I Dont Think Its Good Because There Many Cheats Although Its Auto Ban For Using Autoers On That Server And Will Be On Mine Anyway Lets Start With The Basics

Chapter 1: The Basics
Chapter 2: The Rules
Chapter 3: The Updates
Chapter 4: Length Of Time Left
Chapter 5: Staff Taking On

CHAPTER 1: The Basics

Server Base: PimpScape
Server Owner: Owner Dragon
Server Uptime: Not Yet Sure
Server Bugs: Yes Not Many Now Though
Server Glitches: Yes A Few
Server Membership: Yes
Server Co Owner/s: Co 1: ModKilla Co 2: B L I T Z D Co 3: Melissa T Co 4: Mod Matt
No-ip/Ham: No-Ip
Starting Place: Falador Park!
